column5: I have a 2007 Honda 420 rancher and I need some warmers what ones are the best. Thanks Mike
Im sure royal sells A kit but they won't do much good without hand guards to block wind
Even without wind blocks they help a lot.  S.

I had a 2012 Polaris 500.  I installed the hand & thumb warmers purchased from Polaris.  Very simple to install yourself.  Yes the hand guards do help, but I loved the new windshield I installed.  Block the wind & it makes a world of difference.  Contact your Honda dealer, they'll probably have warmers to suit your machine.  There's a wiring harness you'll need to fit your existing harness.  A slick trick to removing your rubber grips is to use a compressor to blow off the grips.  Very simple. PM me if you would like further info
